opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Donald Marritz, Carolyn L. Carter, Gettysburg, for appellants.
John S. Oyler, H. Lee Roussel, Alan R. Boynton, Jr., Harrisburg, for Knouse Foods Co-op et al.

R. Douglas Sherman, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
